title: Client keeps freezing during banning phase/ Champion phase of Champion Select
body:
Alright  so every time i decide to go into a champ select , it either freezes at the banning phase or freezes during the time i need to pick my champion, which then makes me unable to pick my champion resulting in multiple 5/10/20 minute "No-queing punishment"(I forgot the name).

Sometimes it will work and I can have a nice champ select and be able to play the game.
I've already been using low-spec mode and I can run the actual game pretty well.

I just wanna get back to being able to constantly queing up instead being kicked out of champ select every 8/10 games.
Thank you for listening :) 

Also sometimes we accepting a queue it will just show a black screen instead of even starting the champ select but i think thats a different bug altogether but still is very frequent.

Thank you once again

replies.body:
Thanks so much for replying :) I'll reply again if it works or doesnt in about a day or so 
Thanks for the quick reply as well
Sure thing! :D Glad I could provide some solutions~

i followed every thing I did, additionally i reinstalled league , used the hextech repair tool. 

Yet, Im still having some freezes like when i accepted a queue and my friends got sent into champ select but i was frozen until banning phase 17 seconds left.

Although it is noticeable that the frequency went down, yet i dont know if this could be a random occurrence.

Damn, sorry to hear that.

Another idea I might suggest is also updating your graphics card driver [**with these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2). Typically, that's not a go-to solution for freezes or lag in Select, but it can be another cause for black screens.

All in all though, if these steps aren't helping you should [**send a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Tech so they can help you one on one and more in depth than I can on the Boards. They'll have some further and more technical solutions, so definitely reach out to them when it's convenient for you! :)
